str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
From a compound of apo and hormao; a starting-point, i.e. an opportunity.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To deceive thoroughly. From ek and apatao; to seduce wholly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.
